title: Red Refuge
logline: A lone robot crash-lands on Mars, only to discover a makeshift home and a new sense of purpose.
setting: Mars, a barren yet breathtaking landscape
key_scenes: Exploring the Martian terrain and discovering a cave system
Establishing a makeshift home and adapting to Martian life
image_requirements: Stylized robot design with a mix of metallic and worn parts
Breathtaking Martian landscapes with jagged rocks and vast expanses
